testcase.name: To launch the URL
testcase.system-out: Given User launch the browser and navigates to main page....................passed Then User should be able to view the main page..............................passed

testcase.name: To click on the magnify image to search
testcase.system-out: Given User launch the browser and navigates to main page....................passed When User enters search keyword in the search field.........................passed And User clicks on the magnify image........................................passed Then User validates the relevant search results.............................passed

testcase.name: To check if the Commons Link is navigating to Wikimedia Commons
testcase.system-out: Given User launch the browser and navigates to main page....................passed When User clicks on the Commons Link in the main page.......................passed Then User should be able to navigate to Wikimedia Commons...................passed

testcase.name: To check if help link is working
testcase.system-out: Given User launch the browser and navigates to main page....................passed When User clicks on the help link in the main page..........................passed Then User should be able to navigate to the help page.......................passed
